import React, { Fragment, useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import Breadcrumb from '../../layout/breadcrumb' import { Container, Row, Col, Card, CardHeader, CardBody, CardFooter, Media, Form, FormGroup, Label, Input, Button } from 'reactstrap'; import axios from 'axios' import Layout from "../AppWrapper"; import * as yup from 'yup'; import { toast } from 'react-toastify'; import { withRouter , useHistory} from 'react-router'; import Avatar from 'react-avatar' const api = axios.create({ baseURL: `https://afya-kwanza-backend.herokuapp.com` }) const SaccoProfile = ({location}) => { const [data, setData] = useState({}) // const [token, setToken] = useState('') const [name, setName] = useState('') const [id, setId] = useState('') const history = useHis const getProfile = async () => { // setToken(localStorage.tokenated) // console.log("Stored token=>", token) setName(location.state.sacco_name) console.log("Stored name=>", name) try { const res = await api.get(`/saccos/sacco/${name}`); // console.log("state data==>", res.data[0]) // const data = await res.json(); setData(res.data[0]) // console.log("data with sacco_name querry==>", data) } catch (err) { console.error(err.message); } }; const onChange = e => setData({...data, [e.target.name]: e.target.value}) const handleSubmit = async e =>{ e.preventDefault(); const {sacco_name, sacco_email,admin_email,admin_firstname,admin_lastname,admin_phonenumber} = data try { const res = await api.put(`/saccos/update/${id}`, {sacco_name, sacco_email,admin_email,admin_firstname,admin_lastname,admin_phonenumber}) // console.log("response object=>", res.data.data) toast.success(res.data.msg) } catch (error) { toast.error(error) } } useEffect(() => { getProfile() setId(location.state.id) console.log("sacco id=>", id) }, [name,id]) return (

Admin: {data.admin_firstname} {data.admin_lastname}

); } export default withRouter(SaccoProfile);
